RSS.title: Grayscale's Bitcoin Trust Shares Hit Record Discount of 36.7%
RSS.description: Bitcoin is down nearly 10% to $16,622 as FTX‚Äôs liquidity crisis continues to rattle the markets.
RSS.author: Sam Reynolds

RSS.title: Sequoia Capital marks down entire $214M FTX stake to zero
RSS.description: The venture capital firm assured partners it ran a rigorous due diligence assessment when it invested in FTX, finding the exchange to generate $1 billion in revenue and $250 million in operating income.
RSS.author: Brayden Lindrea

RSS.title: Panic Grips SOL With Record Volatility and Massive Put Demand
RSS.description: An incoming supply deluge seems to have spooked investors in both the spot and derivatives markets.
RSS.author: Omkar Godbole

RSS.title: ‚ÄòTwitter will do lots of dumb things‚Äô in the coming months: Elon Musk
RSS.description: Twitter's new owner says they'll be throwing a heap of new ideas at the platform over the coming months.
RSS.author: Luke Huigsloot

RSS.title: Crypto.com commits to proof-of-reserves after halting certain deposits and withdrawals
RSS.description: "We share the belief that it should be necessary for crypto platforms to publicly share proof of reserves," the Crypto.com CEO said.
RSS.author: Judith BannermanQuist

RSS.title: FTX and Binance‚Äôs ongoing saga: Everything that‚Äôs happened until now
RSS.description: The story between cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and FTX has quickly unfolded and caused havoc in the crypto market, here‚Äôs a breakdown of where it began and where it is now.
RSS.author: Jesse Coghlan

RSS.title: Without Details, Tron's Justin Sun Says He's 'Putting Together Solution' for FTX
RSS.description: Justin Sun tweeted he was putting together some sort of solution for FTX, though he provided no details.
RSS.author: Nikhilesh De

RSS.title: First Mover Asia: Crypto Exchange BitMEX Publishes Proof of Reserves Ahead of Friday‚Äôs BMEX Listing; Bitcoin Rebounds After Dropping Below $16K
RSS.description: On Wednesday, Binance, Gate.io, KuCoin and Huobi were among the exchanges that said they would publish Merkle tree reserve certificates. Their announcements came amid the mounting crisis involving FTX.
RSS.author: Shaurya Malwa, James Rubin

RSS.title: SBF tells investors FTX needs $8B in emergency funding: WSJ
RSS.description: According to reports, FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried asked investors for emergency funding to cover an $8 billion shortfall during a Nov. 9 investors call.
RSS.author: Stephen Katte

RSS.title: FTX website comes back online with message advising against deposits
RSS.description: Neither FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried nor any FTX official has provided its users with clarity as to why FTX‚Äôs website was taken down.
RSS.author: Brayden Lindrea

RSS.title: FTX Investment Now Worth Zero, VC Giant Sequoia Says
RSS.description: In a note to Limited Partners, Sequoia says it invested just over $200 million in FTX via two funds.
RSS.author: Sam Reynolds

RSS.title: Helium Network Founder Pledges to Stick with Solana After Bloody Day for SOL
RSS.description: The wireless hotspot network voted to move to Solana in September.
RSS.author: Danny Nelson

RSS.title: Solana TVL drops 32.4% as FTX turmoil rocks ecosystem
RSS.description: Cryptocurrencies understood to have exposure to Sam Bankman-Fried, FTX, and Alameda Research appear to have been impacted the most.
RSS.author: Luke Huigsloot

RSS.title: Tron Network USDD Stablecoin Wobbles from Dollar Peg Amid Latest Crypto Crisis
RSS.description: The Tron network's algorithmic stablecoin, the $700 million USDD, fell to 97 cents from its supposed $1 anchor.
RSS.author: Krisztian  Sandor

RSS.title: Crypto Stocks Continue Drop as Binance Walks Away from FTX Deal
RSS.description: Concerns around FTX's health along with the broader crypto ecosystem spilled into the stock market Wednesday.
RSS.author: Michael Bellusci

RSS.title: FTX Faces US Justice Department Probe: WSJ
RSS.description: The U.S. Department of Justice is looking into crypto exchange FTX after its apparent collapse, the Wall Street Journal reported Wednesday.
RSS.author: Nikhilesh De

RSS.title: DeFi Exchange Platform dYdX Places Solana in 'Close Only' Mode
RSS.description: The move comes after Solana has plummeted 40% in 24-hours due to its link with the beleaguered Sam Bankman-Fried empire.
RSS.author: Sam  Kessler

RSS.title: OpenSea Makes Waves: Says Creator Royalties Will Be Enforced
RSS.description: ‚ÄúThe world is otherwise burning, but we decided this couldn‚Äôt wait,‚Äù a representative from OpenSea told CoinDesk.
RSS.author: Cameron Thompson

RSS.title: 8 Days in November: What Led to FTX‚Äôs Sudden Collapse
RSS.description: Financier and influencer Sam Bankman-Fried flew exceptionally high during the pandemic-driven crypto bull market. Here‚Äôs what led to his fall, and why it matters for the industry‚Äôs future.
RSS.author: David Z. Morris

RSS.title: A Failed FTX-Binance Deal Is ‚ÄòCatastrophic‚Äô for Crypto Sector
RSS.description: Binance scrapping its acquisition of rival FTX could mean institutional investors deciding to pull some of their money out of the crypto industry.
RSS.author: Aoyon Ashraf

RSS.title: Bitcoin price hits multi-year low at $15.6K, analysts expect further downside
RSS.description: BTC and altcoins collapse following news that Binance declined to purchase FTX. Analysts share their perspectives on what‚Äôs next for the market.
RSS.author: Kyle White

RSS.title: OKX, Kucoin say proof of reserves will be ready in a month
RSS.description: Similar protocols are used by Kraken, Bitmex, Gate.io, and many other exchanges, but were not used by FTX.
RSS.author: Tom Blackstone

RSS.title: Market Wrap: Bitcoin, Other Cryptos Continue to Plummet
RSS.description: The largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization was hurtling toward $16K amid the growing fallout from crypto exchange FTX‚Äôs collapse. Market Wrap is CoinDesk‚Äôs daily newsletter diving into what happened in today's crypto markets.
RSS.author: James Rubin, Sage D. Young, Jocelyn Yang

RSS.title: SBF Warns FTX Investors of Bankruptcy Without More Cash: Bloomberg
RSS.description: FTX is headed toward bankruptcy without a cash infusion.
RSS.author: Danny Nelson

RSS.title: FTX Website Experiences Temporary Outage, Warns Users Not to Make Deposits

RSS.author: Cheyenne Ligon

RSS.title: MiCA proponent cites FTX in advocating for regulation: 'Crypto assets are not play money'
RSS.description: "With a global MiCA, the FTX crash would not have happened," said European Parliament economics committee member Stefan Berger.
RSS.author: Turner Wright

RSS.title: FTX Blowup Puts Trove of Prized Bored Apes at Risk of Liquidation

RSS.author: Eli Tan, Cameron Thompson

RSS.title: With FTX Bloodied, Rival in US Regulatory Fight Adds Another Knife
RSS.description: An old-guard rival of FTX from the derivatives markets sought to drive a stake through its heart as the crypto company struggled to save itself from financial disaster on Wednesday. A subsidiary of Cboe Global Markets Inc. sent a letter on Wednesday to its customers ‚Äì addressed as the ‚Äúcrypto community‚Äù ‚Äì reminding them of its own customer-protection practices.
RSS.author: Jesse Hamilton

RSS.title: Orthogonal Credit alleged key weaknesses in Alameda‚Äôs due diligence early in 2022

RSS.title: The Downfall of Sam Bankman-Fried‚Äôs FTX: The Industry Reacts
RSS.author: Daniel Kuhn

RSS.author: Zhiyuan Sun

RSS.title: Alameda, In Eye of Crypto Storm, Takes $37M of Wrapped Bitcoin Off FTX.US Exchange
RSS.description: The purpose of the token movements is unclear, and the amount likely a small portion of the overall firm's holdings, but the observation shows Alameda scrambling to arrange its finances ‚Äì using the Ethereum blockchain.

RSS.title: StarkWare Launches Nonprofit Foundation to Fuel StarkNet Ecosystem
RSS.description: The foundation becomes official with a stash of StarkNet Tokens and a seven-member board.
RSS.author: Brandy Betz

RSS.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
RSS.description: Crypto prices collapse as investor fears over FTX‚Äôs solvency and the status of customer funds send Bitcoin and altcoin prices to multiyear lows.
RSS.author: Ray Salmond

RSS.title: Alameda Research and FTX Ventures websites go dark
RSS.description: Pages for the quantitative trading firm and the venture capital arm have been taken offline and made private.

RSS.title: Binance‚Äôs victory over FTX means more users moving away from central exchanges

RSS.title: Why Is Crypto Tanking: The FTX-Binance Drama Explained

RSS.title: Solana Blockchain Hit by FTX Tremors as Nearly $800M SOL Tokens Set to Be Unstaked

RSS.title: FTX and Alameda Contagion Fears Tank NFT Markets
